title: Revealed: The Tories' 24-hour meme machine plotting to win the next election
text:
As another General Election looms, the battle for No10 will fundamentally be fought and won online. In a four-part special series, we will investigate the tactics and dark arts being used by all of the parties to shape the outcome. Today's Part 1 looks at the Tories' 'meme machine'.

It was a victory that seemed to come out of nowhere. Five months ago, Scott Morrison and his Liberal-led Australian coalition government managed to narrowly win a third term, despite polling that placed them behind the Australian Labor Party for almost three years.

At the heart of that victory was a revolution in the way they campaigned. Out went the team of ex-Liberal party federal director Tony Nutt, which viewed social...
description: As another General Election looms, the battle for No10 will fundamentally be fought and won online.
